#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#define Maxx 1000
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int i,j,k,l,t,n,m,cnt=0,p;
    double x,save;
    int a[Maxx],test,y;
 
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cnt++;
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
 
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            save=100*x;
            a[i]=(long long)(save+0.5);
        }
 
        printf("Case %d:\n",cnt);
 
        sort(a,a+n);
 
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
            cin>>x;
            save=100*x;
            test=(long long)(save+0.5); //cout<<x<<test<<endl;
            p=n-1;
 
            while(test!=0)
            {
                if(a[p]<=test)
                {
                    y=test/a[p];
                    if(a[p]%100==0)
                    printf("%d %d\n",a[p]/100,y);
                    else
                    {
                        if((a[p]/10)!=0)
                        {
                            printf("0.");
                            printf("%d %d\n",a[p],y);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            printf("0."); printf("0");
                            printf("%d %d\n",a[p],y);
                        }
                    }
                    test%=a[p];
                }
                else
                {
                    p--;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
